subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: The case for faces.
author: Adrienne B
full_text:
Thank you Frank.  I can understand your frustration with what's happened
(that someone would put you in that position with your job is hard to
believe!)  You began this fascinating leap into whatever realm this is and
you most probably understand it better than anyone else.

Your contributions are very important to me, and it seems like many others
in this group, as well as those of the other people with a high level of
experience, and the ideas and contributions so many others have made or will
make.  The "paranormal field" can't just stop at a comfortable, accepted
point, with just human spirits defined and packaged, as Draiga pointed out.
 There's too much out there to explore and if anything discovered is "real"
I think we had better know that.  Though I have to admit that I may never
fully understand what/who "they" are unless they come and talk to me in
person and fill me in.  And I really hope "your guys" are just messing with
us :), though I have my doubts sometimes with all of this education I'm
getting about "sustainable management of the planet for the survival of the
human species", when we don't even know what we have messed up fully or how
to fix it.

Ok, enough off topic stuff.  I'm so glad your still here!

- Adrienne


On Mon, Jan 3, 2011 at 7:57 PM, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...
> wrote:

>
>
> Don't take my moody BS personally. I don this all the time and I'l try to
